storyInfo: Swire and Hoshiguma share a conversation about the city, while Ch'en and Lin Yühsia share the information they have with each other in a bar. At the same time, Ernesto has his own plans.

attributes.content: (She's gone?!)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (But she shouldn't have spotted me.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Perhaps she's got training and keeps her anti-surveillance act up?)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Or is there some place around here she can sneak into without anyone noticing?)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Oh well... I'll go look for Hui-chieh first.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: First things first, let's look at which teams made it.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: A total of fifteen teams entered the first round of this competition.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Team LUNG wRATh is definitely this competition's hottest team.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Team Grey Feather, Team Pacer-man, Team Honey Summer, Team Business Cooperation Call 5453-46235...
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Nice work out there, D.D.D.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Sorry you had to take on such an unfamiliar job.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: No prob. I'm used to tooting the big shots' horns.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: I thought I wouldn't be cut out for this, but it turns out it's basically just like DJing.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: It's just one uses music to get the crowd pumped up, while the other uses words.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: It's great that you think that way. If you don't want to do it, though, I'll do everything I can to turn the job down.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I gotta say, I'm really just going along for the ride. I did kinda think I said some stuff I probably wouldn't have said before, though.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: That was close.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: But I really gotta say. You saw how that team LUNG wRATh did.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Those two chicks on the team were amazing.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Oh, I agree.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Just watching the two of them was enough to really give me that creative itch.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Makes me want to write a song for them, y'know?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: And knowing I can keep watching them fight in the VIP section motivates me to stick with this job, too.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Haha, that's great to hear.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Eh, Missy, I don't get it. The competition's over, and only now are you excited.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You've been strolling around the streets for the past few days, but it doesn't really look like that's all you're doing either. Is there something out here that piques your interest?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm taking a stroll around alright, but I do have another reason.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I want to get to know this city.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How come?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You see, Bolívar is right out there, past the city's borders. A country under three different governments.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The Singas government that's propped up by Leithanien, the Coalition government supported by Columbia, and the True Bolívarians that sprang up to oppose those two governments.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm sure clashes between those three governments, big and small, are happening all across the country while we're just sitting here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And this city doesn't look like any of the other Bolívarian cities that we stopped at on our way here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You can't say this one's just prosperous. Even I've never seen a place so extravagant, so totally dedicated to leisure.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't you think it's strange that a city like this popped up in Bolívar?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Well, I do think it's strange, but this isn't Lungmen, and I can't be bothered to look into it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You know, you know everything, but if it's got nothing to do with Lungmen or Ch'en, you never seem to care.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's a force of habit. Go on, Missy. You've got an idea or something, don't you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If this city was dark and gloomy, then I certainly wouldn't have felt anything off about it. On the contrary, though, it's so full of energy here that it's irritating.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: If every city out there had a heart, then Lungmen's would probably be a lively one, and its blood would be healthy, and vivid red, always getting pumped to the heart to keep it going.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: But Dossoles's heart is way too shady. It keeps on pumping in dirty, black blood, but it doesn't hurt. In fact, it's somehow beating even stronger than our healthy Lungmen.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And that makes the place seem like it's got more pep than Lungmen.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And let's not even go into how Lungmen very rarely finds itself held back by any external forces. This city is in Bolívar, where the political situation couldn't be more messed up.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't you think that's strange?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, that's a good analogy. Really makes it easy to understand.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So you're curious why the city is like this, even when it shouldn't be?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: This city tolerates crime, encourages gambling, and you've got the most voluptuous, spendthrifty kinds here. Each and every day, someone hits it big, while some other poor sod goes bankrupt.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: This creates the illusion that this city's main sources of income are its tourism and entertainment industries—They attract visitors and squeeze the money out of them.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: An entertainment industry by itself can't support all of a city's operations, however. That's why the city leaves its entertainment industry and even crime on the streets unchecked, attracting all kinds of sketchy people.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And that gives the city its false, unstable prosperity.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: There's an explanation.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: But is that really how things are?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hm... Missy, I kind of think you're overreacting a little.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What did you just say?!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It makes sense, though. For a pampered lady like you, the way this city works is uncommon and barbaric.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But it's all pretty near and dear to me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm sure you know that Higashi isn't in a much better shape than Bolívar. In Higashi, even when there's a full-scale war outside, the elites holed up inside couldn't care less.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Fundamentally, this city isn't all that different from those cities I know.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, but now that you mention it, it's true that you can't run a city on entertainment and tourism alone.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: There aren't any cities like that in Higashi either.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So I guess you should tell me more, Missy. About your discovery.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't wanna talk about it anymore.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, come on, Missy. It's all my bad, okay?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Waiter, one raspado de verano, please. For the lady.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Okay, Missy, don't be mad. Cool off with some shaved ice, okay?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph, do you remember what happened when we came to this city?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Didn't we walk right in as soon as you flashed your card?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's me being well-prepared. Lungmen has a trade agreement with Dossoles, so I could come right in with just my card.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm not talking about myself. I'm talking about the other people that were there.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, I remember seeing a few pretty nervous guys trying to get inside. The guards asked them a few questions, but let them through right after.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The guards were pretty friendly, too. They even gave them directions.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Do you remember seeing a lot of factories outside the city center?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yes, I did.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Bingo.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. The political situation is ever-changing in Bolívar, so it's dangerous to rely on trade for daily necessities.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So the city had to take fate into its own hands.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And those poor folks are factory workers.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's right. I asked around at the bar the last couple days. The factories here apparently pay really well.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That's why a lot of people take the arduous journey just to come here to work.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And if they manage to get a good foothold here, that's going to make them a small fortune compared to outside.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right. It may not make them as much as fighting for the Coalition or Singas, but working here is much safer.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Haha, I'm not sure which is safer, between getting bludgeoned to death in a back alley or dying on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Stop interrupting. After that, I looked up some old news articles. This city may be known all over Bolívar for its entertainment industry, but its wine, coffee, and sugar are the finest in the country too.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: All the Bolívarian elites, whether they are from the Coalition, Singas, or True Bolívarians, are buying them up.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And even outside, I've seen lots of Bolívarian tequila and coffee back home. I don't remember the exact place they were produced, but I've definitely seen these factories' brands before.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The guards are well-equipped and full of energy...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And otherwise, aside from its entertainment and tourism sectors, the city also has a firm grip over a luxury goods industry that no one can ignore.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I get what you mean now. The city may seem chaotic on the surface, but it's actually very stable deep down. It's 100% capable of becoming a proper, methodical city like Lungmen.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Now this is really starting to pique my interest.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And here you said I was overreacting.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I beg your forgiveness, Milady. Your insight is unparalleled. A lowly errand girl like me cannot dare to compare.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's some glib tongue you got.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Really though, Missy. Speaking from experience, the answer you seek is actually very simple.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No matter what, those who stand on top will never tolerate a variable out of their control.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If this city is managing to keep this appearance up, then that must mean that, to its ruler, what we think is chaotic here is hardly worth batting an eye over.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: In other words, this city has a powerful, crazed mastermind.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's my conclusion as well.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The mayor is named Candela Sanchez.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: My family participates in some of the business dealings between Lungmen and Dossoles, but I've really never truly understood her or her city until now.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm curious just what kind of a person she is to shape her city this way.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You could talk to her directly. Just tell her who you are. She'll most definitely see you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'll pass. You can fool others with words, but not with the outcomes of your actions.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Let's go. We still have a lot of places to visit.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I want to take a look at the factories in the countryside. Let's hurry.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ma'am, your raspado.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Hey, wait, Missy. Your ice just got here.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, what do I do with this girl... Sometimes she's just like Ch'en. Always so impatient.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Fine, I'll eat it myself.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Missy, wait up!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Green hair and a horn... Is that Hoshiguma?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Nothing. Just thought I saw an old friend.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: From Lungmen? Where?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: There's too many people. She was gone after I looked away for just a second. It's okay. There's no way she'd be here. My eyes are probably playing tricks on me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And what about you? You asked to meet here, and you're late?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I took a detour. Let's go in first.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This isn't that bar you trashed the other day, right?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's my turf now. Come on.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hey, boss, what brings you here?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Make sure no one comes near us. We'll be talking, alone.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Casino Underling

attributes.content: A whiskey.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Just soda water for me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right away.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Go ahead. What is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I doubt you'd ever invite me out just for drinks.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I tailed a team during the match. They were going all around the residential district, setting up bombs.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And judging from their conversation, there were probably at least three or four teams doing the same.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Didn't you just say...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, so you suspect Ernesto.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well, I see where you're coming from. That's no small operation, and news of it wouldn't have gotten to Lady Candela if it had been just a single smuggling operation.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Someone is definitely manipulating the information somewhere down the line. Ernesto's fairly suspicious, but even if he's in the clear, there's definitely somebody else.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I can't get to the bottom of everything just by myself, though I do have one of the bombs right here in my pocket, at the very least.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Want to give it a squeeze?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Which team?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Grey Feather.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Them, huh? Didn't expect that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It wouldn't have occurred to me either.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Which means they're definitely up to something, and they have a well organized plan.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And since they've got explosives, that's definitely no normal plan.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I think we should talk to Lady Candela first.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm sure you've noticed what they are propping up this city's colorful appearance with, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And Lady Candela, the mayor of the city, is allowing all of this to happen under her nose.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Does a city like this, or someone like her, really deserve your help?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm going to fight you again if you tell me you'll let those guys set up bombs just because of that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Quite the opposite.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I don't really care that much about what this city is like or what's going to happen to it.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm here to represent Chief Wei. What I care about is Chief Wei's image.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's why I don't really have a choice. I have to complete Lady Candela's request.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But what about you? How do I know you're not standing up against me because of that overflowing sense of justice of yours?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: All of a sudden, Ch'en lifts her head and stares straight into Lin Yühsia's eyes.
What are you trying to say?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia isn't backing down either. She, too, is staring straight at Ch'en.
What I'm saying, Hui-chieh, is that you should stop faking all those emotions you have for people you've never even met.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You have no right to get involved with anything that has to do with the city, and you definitely have no right to blame me for anything.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.text: A thunderous 'pop,' that of a fist and a palm clashing together, rings through the quiet bar.
Ch'en's fist is about an inch away from Lin Yühsia's face, held firmly back only by Lin Yühsia's palm.
Their faces are still as water, leaving only their fierce stares to reveal their convictions.

Standing not far away from them, the casino boss sees a shapeless fire burning amidst their silence. The flame is raging and growing more intense by the second, as though it could engulf everything in their vicinity at any moment.
Right away, he starts to work out how much he will spend renovating his casino, as well as which contractor in the neighborhood charges the least.
However, contrary to his expectations, the flame does not erupt into a volcano of rage.
After another brief moment of silence, Ch'en retracts her fist, and Lin Yühsia lowers her hand.

attributes.content: This won't help you absolve yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And I'm not trying to absolve myself.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: One day, I will make sure you pay for all that you've done.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And how will you make me do that, Lungmen Special Inspection Unit Chief Emeritus, Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: With righteousness.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well, at least that has a slightly better ring to it than justice. If that day ever comes, I will be ready and accept my punishment.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Anything else?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's it. You can do whatever you want to do, and I will do things my way. That's what I'm trying to tell you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The fewer people who know about this, the better, but we should at least let Lady Candela know, no matter how we go about this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Even if you tell her, there isn't all that much she can do.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We still don't know what their objective is. Trying to scope them out or arrest them is just going to startle them.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Also, don't use your phone.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I don't need you to tell me that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, right. I forgot how much you cops love your wiretaps.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You really want a fight, don't you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I haven't the interest.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well, you've made up your mind. Go talk to Lady Candela, then. I've got better things to do.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I never thought the day would come for us to work together...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Likewise.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't have a big enough fist, and what are you standing up straight like that for...?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Shop's closed today.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'd like a fishing rod.
Come in.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hermano, can't you stop changing the password every day? It's a chore to get them down.
No.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Rafaela, stop letting your guard down. Do you know how hard it was for me to disguise your mistake as some normal weapons smuggling?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If Ms. Candela manages to sniff us out, we're done for.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If you're doing this, see it through.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Fine.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I'm not trying to yell at you, Rafaela. You're a klutz, but you do a decent job with everything you need to do.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It's the idiots who don't know the gravity of all this.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This city is full of entertainment, but if that's all the city has, there's no way it could've gotten such a foothold in Bolívar.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But you still called me a klutz...
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: But, my lovely sister, you are a klutz, no?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Actually, I got the feeling that I was being followed just now.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'm not sure, but that's what it felt like.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I'll let everyone in the competitions know to be careful.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Never mind... I guess that, outside of the mission, these guys aren't all that different from the folks who live here. You wouldn't be able to get much out of them.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Anyway, how did the mission go?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We got the bombs installed in the residential district.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Did anyone find you?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I ran into the purple-haired girl on your team about halfway through. I avoided a direct confrontation with her, like you'd told me.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: And what did she do?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: She didn't bother us.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: She didn't come to me about it. I guess she really didn't notice...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No, there's no guarantee that's the case. She's clearly mistrustful of me, even more so than Ch'en. It's possible that she found out but chose to hide it from me.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And even if she found out, there's probably very little she could do...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: *Sigh*, they don't want to work together, and I can't keep an eye on both of them at once. What a pain.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Your orders?
attributes.name: Soldier

attributes.content: If the mayor starts investigating the competition area, let my father know right away.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Soldier

attributes.content: Phew, I guess this will do for now.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I've taken a look at which teams made it through. Out of the forty teams in the competition, twelve are on our side, and nine of those made it through. It's more or less what I expected.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Yeah, if it wasn't for the blue haired girl getting in the way, we probably could've taken down another team or two.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: It was never all that reliable of a plan, luring out teams with pure gold out in the open and then taking them down, so there's really nothing to complain about with these results.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We made it through the first round. All we have to do during the second round is get in the other teams' way.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: After all, the second round's full of Ms. Candela's underlings hiding in every corner to ambush anyone who tries to take a shortcut. It's not the right time to set up more bombs.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And the less teams at the end of the second round, the better. That's our goal in this round. You remember that, right?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Stop taking me for a dummy.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I'm just telling you again, just in case.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Right, since you're here, I might as well tell you now. There's a change in plans.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What's wrong? Are those outsiders that tough?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Yeah, they're probably a little too tough, even.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Should we take them out?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: First, we'd probably pay a dear price for that.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And secondly... They are good people.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Good people?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: That's right. Good people.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If I'd known them longer, I'd even try to persuade them to join our cause.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Would they join us?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: No idea, but it's not happening now.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's why I can only assume the old man will be in danger if they get close to him on the ship. We'll need to do all we can to stall them.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But to get to the point, I probably won't be on the ship, so I'll probably try to work with you on land.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Will you need my help?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: If it comes down to it, I will. That's why I'm telling you this now.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Let's move on to something less serious.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That reminds me, Rafaela. You've lived in this city for a few years now. Do you know where the name Dossoles came from?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hm? I haven't really heard why... But I'm guessing it has to do with why they call this the City of Two Suns.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: That's right. Now take another guess. Which two suns?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hm... The one on the sky?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: This one's too obvious. You can see it just by looking up.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And the second one... is the one you see in the water?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Very good. I thought you wouldn't figure it out.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The city's ocean completely engulfs the sun in the sky.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Papa told me about that before.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Now, do you know that this city was almost renamed Tressoles, the City of Three Suns?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Huh? Three suns?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: That's right. Now what do you think the third sun is?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The third sun...?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Maybe the mayor?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's one theory. Ms. Candela is like the city's sun, and this city only exists because of her.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's not the right answer, though.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Huh? It's not?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: The mayor is a prideful person, but she wouldn't compare herself with the sun. Her pride is above even the sun.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: She wouldn't put herself on the same level as two other suns. She would say all three suns are hers.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Then what's the third sun?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: The answer's simple. It's on your papa's boat.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: He's your papa... He's my step-dad. Eh, is it the pretty gold statue?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Haha, that's right. That's the city's third sun.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Supposedly, it took everyone quite a while to persuade Ms. Candela not to go there.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That sounds kinda lame.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Is there anything that isn't lame about this city?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It looks like you enjoy living here though.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Do I look like I enjoy this place?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You don't?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I kind of think you've been enjoying working for the mayor the last few years.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: If that's the case, why would I help Father?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No idea. I've always thought you weren't going to.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Your intuition is always so on point.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And here you just called me a klutz.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Anyway, let's get back to preparing for the match.
attributes.name: Ernesto
